modName: Pushup Sexy Glass and Falmer Armor CBBE v3
summary: Replace the glass armor and Falmer armor with a more feminized one with a pushup effect.
descriptionHtml:
Page under construction
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/210/headernbu1.png/][IMG]http://img210.imageshack.us/img210/5581/headernbu1.png[/IMG][/URL]

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/860/decirption.jpg/][IMG]http://img860.imageshack.us/img860/236/decirption.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[b]Hi and welcome on my mod. You loved the Pushup Bikini ? Unfortunately this is not practical for killing dragons. This a solution for you :
This mod replace the orginal glass armor by my famouse version of glass armor. I add to it my pushup body to give a more natural effect with the tight clothes. The breasts are not wood, they own a physic. According to the clothing worn they change shape and adapt. This mod correct that. The effect is more noticeable if you have a character with a big chest. Remember, it is not animated, it has to be considered as a clothe.[/b]

[i]Explanations for cavemen. [/i]

[center][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/11764-1-1330882411.jpg/][IMG]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/11764-1-1330882411.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/center]


[b]Q : The pushup Effect affect all the bodu/armor of the game ?[/B]

-No, only the clothes or armors called \"pushup\" will give you with effect. It is a body replacer dedicated to certain body armor I made.

[b]Next project ? [/B]

-Yes, I\'m working on this body to convert some clothes with this shape. but I do not want it to be vulgar. 

[color=orange][b]Check my others mods compatible with.[/b][/color]


[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11764]PushUp Bikini[/URL]

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/43/updateyu.jpg/][IMG]http://img43.imageshack.us/img43/1497/updateyu.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
